info.author: Caroline Friedel
info.description: runs samtools view on BAM/SAM/CRAM files

param.name: bamoutput
param.description: output BAM

param.name: cramoutput
param.description: output CRAM (requires -T)

param.name: fastCompression
param.description: use fast BAM compression (implies -b)

param.name: uncompressedBam
param.description: uncompressed BAM output (implies -b)

param.name: includeHeader
param.description: include header in SAM output

param.name: printOnlyHeader
param.description: print SAM header only (no alignments)

param.name: printCounts
param.description: print only the count of matching records

param.name: output
param.description: output file name

param.name: outputReadsNotSelected
param.description: output reads not selected by filters to FILE

param.name: referenceLengths
param.description: FILE listing reference names and lengths (see long help)

param.name: bedfile
param.description: only include reads overlapping this BED FILE

param.name: readgroup
param.description: only include reads in read group STR

param.name: readgroupFile
param.description: only include reads with read group listed in FILE

param.name: mappingquality
param.description: only include reads with mapping quality >= INT

param.name: library
param.description: only include reads in library STR

param.name: minquerylength
param.description: only include reads with number of CIGAR operations consuming query sequence >= INT

param.name: bitsset
param.description: only include reads with all bits set in INT set in FLAG

param.name: bitsnotset
param.description: only include reads with none of the bits set in INT set in FLAG

param.name: readTagToStrip
param.description: read tag to strip (repeatable)

param.name: collapseCIGAROperation
param.description: collapse the backward CIGAR operation

param.name: seed
param.description: -s FLOAT integer part sets seed of random number generator rest sets fraction of templates to subsample

param.name: threads
param.description: -@, --threads INT number of BAM/CRAM compression threads

param.name: printLongHelp
param.description: print long help, including note about region specification

param.name: inputfmtoption
param.description: --input-fmt-option OPT Specify a single input file format option in the form of OPTION or OPTION=VALUE

param.name: outputfmt
param.description: -O, --output-fmt FORMAT Specify output format (SAM, BAM, CRAM)

param.name: outputfmtoption
param.description: --output-fmt-option OPT Specify a single output file format option in the form of OPTION or OPTION=VALUE

param.name: reference
param.description: -T, --reference FILE Reference sequence FASTA FILE

param.name: inbam
param.description: input bam file

param.name: insam
param.description: input sam file

param.name: incram
param.description: input cram file

param.name: region
param.description: region selected
